statements: SELECT * FROM drugs
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM drugs
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE efficacy_score > 80
SELECT drug_name FROM drugs WHERE safety_score < 70
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score, safety_score FROM drugs ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE efficacy_score > 80 ORDER BY drug_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM drugs WHERE safety_score < 70 ORDER BY efficacy_score ASC
SELECT drug_id, drug_name FROM drugs WHERE efficacy_score < 50 AND safety_score > 60
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE drug_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY safety_score DESC, efficacy_score ASC
SELECT drug_name, safety_score FROM drugs WHERE efficacy_score >= 70 ORDER BY safety_score ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Drug_Efficacy_Safety;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM Drug_Efficacy_Safety WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT trial_id, trial_date, result FROM Trial_Results ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, safety_rating FROM Drug_Efficacy_Safety WHERE efficacy_score > 8;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score, safety_rating FROM Drug_Efficacy_Safety WHERE drug_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM Drug_Efficacy_Safety WHERE efficacy_score > 8.0;
SELECT drug_name, safety_rating FROM Drug_Efficacy_Safety ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Efficacy_Safety WHERE safety_rating = 'High' AND efficacy_score > 6.0;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score, safety_rating FROM Drug_Efficacy_Safety WHERE safety_rating = 'Low' ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, trial_date, result FROM Trial_Results JOIN Drug_Efficacy_Safety ON Trial_Results.drug_id = Drug_Efficacy_Safety.drug_id WHERE result = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM drugs ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT trial_id, drug_id, trial_date FROM trials WHERE trial_results = 'positive';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score, safety_score FROM drugs JOIN trials ON drugs.drug_id = trials.drug_id WHERE trial_results = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE efficacy_score > 0.5 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score, safety_score FROM drugs WHERE drug_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT d.*, t.trial_date, t.trial_results FROM drugs d JOIN trials t ON d.drug_id = t.drug_id WHERE d.efficacy_score > 0.7 ORDER BY t.trial_date ASC;

SELECT p.patient_name, p.age, p.gender, d.drug_name, t.trial_results FROM patients p JOIN trials t ON p.patient_id = t.trial_id JOIN drugs d ON t.drug_id = d.drug_id WHERE p.gender = 'female' ORDER BY p.age DESC;

SELECT d.drug_name, AVG(d.efficacy_score) AS avg_efficacy_score, AVG(d.safety_score) AS avg_safety_score, COUNT(t.trial_id) AS num_trials FROM drugs d JOIN trials t ON d.drug_id = t.drug_id WHERE t.trial_results = 'success' GROUP BY d.drug_id HAVING num_trials > 2 ORDER BY avg_efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drug;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type FROM Drug ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM Study WHERE study_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT trial_name, trial_date FROM ClinicalTrial ORDER BY trial_date;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type FROM Drug;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_age FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM Study WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(study_description) > 100;
SELECT trial_name, trial_date, trial_result FROM ClinicalTrial ORDER BY trial_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrial WHERE trial_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM drug
SELECT name, type FROM drug
SELECT manufacturer, efficacy_rating FROM drug WHERE efficacy_rating > 3
SELECT * FROM trial ORDER BY trial_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patient
SELECT * FROM drug ORDER BY name DESC, efficacy_rating ASC
SELECT name, type FROM drug WHERE manufacturer='Pfizer'
SELECT trial_id, trial_date, result FROM trial WHERE result='successful' AND trial_date>'2020-01-01'
SELECT patient.name, patient.age, trial.result FROM patient JOIN trial ON patient.patient_id = trial.patient_id
SELECT drug.name, side_effects.side_effect, side_effects.severity FROM drug JOIN side_effects ON drug.drug_id = side_effects.drug_id
